SELECT c.TABLE_NAME as tableName, c.table_comment as tableComment FROM information_schema.`TABLES` AS c WHERE c.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{schema}
and TABLE_NAME like concat('%',#{tableName},'%')
and table_comment like concat('%',#{tableComment},'%')
ORDER BY create_time desc

SELECT c.COLUMN_NAME, c.COLUMN_COMMENT,c.DATA_TYPE FROM information_schema.`COLUMNS` AS c WHERE 1=1
and c.TABLE_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{tableName},'%')
and c.COLUMN_COMMENT like concat('%',#{columnComment},'%')
